CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Anniversary_Treatment__c , "Reset - Hire Date"), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c)), DAY(TODAY()) = DAY(tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c), MONTH(TODAY()) = MONTH(tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c) ), IF( ISPICKVAL( Anniversary_Treatment__c , "Reset - Calendar Year"), AND( DAY(TODAY()) = 1, MONTH(TODAY()) = 1 ), FALSE ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Automatically becomes true based on the reset rule defined in the linked Leave Rule:
If the Anniversary Treatment is "Reset - hire date", the checkbox is true only on the employee's work anniversary (same day and month as their hire date). If the Anniversary Treatment is "Reset - calendar year", the checkbox is true only on January 1st each year. On all other dates, the checkbox remains false.
CustomField.label: Is Leave Reset Day?
